name: Room set outs and wall locations consistent with approved plans
Trades QA received, reviewed, attached and approved
COMPACT - Insulation Checklist prior to lining
Area accessible, substrate acceptable and approval to start works (If not comment below)
All delivered materials checked & aligning with consented design and specifications prior to install
General photos, comments and observations during insulation install (Add below)
Double check product once installed & attach relevant evidence
Correct product & R value as per specification (R-Value label attached to wall)
All Insulation completed correctly to specification & within tolerance in respective area(s) (Photographic evidence provided)
